item.title: Trading Predictor Based on Algo Trading: Returns up to 35.21% in 3 Days
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Trading Predictor

An insider is legally permitted to buy and sell shares of the firm – and any subsidiaries – that employs him or her. However, these transactions must be properly registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and are done with advance filings. You can find details of this type of insider trading on the SEC's EDGAR database. This algorithmic forecast is for stocks with recently reported insiders' transactions.An "insider" is any person who possesses at least one of the following:

  • access to valuable non-public information about a corporation (for example a company's directors and high-level executives)
  • ownership of more than 10% of the company's equity
Package Name: Insiders Stocks
Forecast Length: 3 Days (03/27/2017 - 03/30/2017)
I Know First Average: 5.55%
I Know First’s State of the Art Algorithm accurately forecasted 10 out of 10 trades in this Insiders Stocks Package for the 3 Days time period. The greatest return came from OMER at 35.21%. CRAY and NKTR also performed well for this time horizon with returns of 4.04% and 3.70%, respectively. The package itself saw an overall return of 5.55%, providing investors with a 4.52% premium above the S&P 500’s return of 1.03% for the same time period. Omeros Corporation (OMER), is a biopharmaceutical company, that discovers, develops, and commercializes small-molecule and protein therapeutics, and orphan indications. Algorithmic traders utilize these daily forecasts by the I Know First market prediction system as a tool to enhance portfolio performance, verify their own analysis and act on market opportunities faster.
